ygData.subject: Re: 130 Strn Rocks!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey patty, All i know of that raises strenght is other forms of armor....werewolf skin armor (lupine armor, each peice gives different stats pluses) and
ygData.messageBody:
Hey patty,

All i know of that raises strenght is other forms of armor....werewolf skin
armor (lupine armor, each peice gives different stats pluses) and alligator
skin armor, as for rings and such i havent found any ....yet...youll be fine
with 130 strentgh...
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> plate mail, I am sure I will still be weighted down. The question is:
> What
> is around to magically raise my strength?
